item.description:
We will ride to Bedford and back, which is 4 miles each way, then possibly extend our ride by going east before returning to the starting point for lunch. We will be going at a moderate pace.

Meet in the Depot Square parking lot which is behind Bertucci's and adjacent the bike path. Parking is inexpensive, and you can park for longer periods.

This event is being led by Carol, Norm and Trish. Because of the large size of the group it will probably be necessary to separate into 2 or 3 smaller groups leaving at intervals.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Depot Square parking lot behind Bertucci's
item.name: Minuteman bike trail
